name: xnegrecl2d

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, c0 ∈ ℝ, c0 ∈ ℝ*, -e(c0)∈ ℝ)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cxne(c0), cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)), wcel(c0, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cxne(c0), cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)), wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cxne(c0), cr)), wcel(c0, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cxne(c0), cr))

comment: If the extended real negative is real, then the number itself is real. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
